title: Anker just unveiled a new line of GaN charging devices. Here's what to know
description: The new Anker Prime charging accessories can help you charge more devices faster with just one accessory.

title: Forget the Apple Watch Ultra: This is the ultimate outdoor smartwatch
description: The Apple Watch Ultra is good, but comparing it to the Garmin 7X Sapphire Solar makes it clear that it's far from perfect.

title: Using TikTok as a news source? Here are 3 ways to identify misinformation
description: People increasingly use TikTok and other short video platforms as news sources. Here's how to stay alert and aware of misinformation.

title: You can send a hug through the internet with this haptic invention
description: The sensation of touch is crucial to human wellbeing. This innovation promises to make physical contact with others possible, even when they're thousands of miles away.

title: 92% of programmers are using AI tools, says GitHub developer survey
description: AI isn't programming's future, it's its present.

title: Anker expands into home energy solutions with new Solix brand
description: Anker also unveils a Powerwall-like modular solar battery system.

title: How to use the scp command in Linux
description: If you've been looking for an easy way to move files between Linux machines, Jack Wallen shows you how with the help of the scp command.

title: EU moves ahead with draft law to regulate AI
description: The EU passed a draft of the AI Act on Wednesday, a law promoting the responsible use of AI.

title: How to use speech-to-text in Safari for hands-free typing
description: If you need to be able to use speech-to-text to type within your web browser, macOS has a very simple accessibility solution.

title: What you need to unlock GoPro's amazing time-lapse feature
description: It seems a lot of people are struggling to use the time-lapse or star trails feature on their GoPros, but aren't having much success. You're not alone. Here's what you need to make it work.

title: This $200 light panel turned my basement into a video studio
description: If you've struggled to get enough light for your videos, this LED will brighten your day.

title: How to get a Twitter blue checkmark (and other minor features)
description: How do you get verified for that once cherished -- and now somewhat tarnished -- blue checkmark? We walk you step-by-step through the process of signing up for Twitter Blue.

title: Samsung announces a new heart health tracking feature for Galaxy Watch users
description: When an heart unusual rhythm is detected, the wearer will receive a notification indicating their heartbeat is abnormal and they should take an ECG test for further analysis – a feature the Galaxy Watch also offers.

title: Amazon Fire Max 11 review: Easily the best Fire tablet yet
description: The newest Amazon Fire tablet checks all of the boxes for an affordable, mid-range tablet. But you'll want to read the rest before buying one.

title: This is Google's $200 Metal Link Pixel Watch band - and it feels as premium as it looks
description: The band was originally announced last year as coming this spring, and, well, the time has come.
